articles.author: Sean Conlon, Liz Napolitano
articles.title: Stocks are little changed after S&P 500 posts back-to-back losses: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Stocks slipped on Monday as investors sold their tech holdings heading into the end of 2025.
articles.content:
Stocks were relatively unchanged on Tuesday, a day after the S&P 500 posted back-to-back losses amid mounting pressure across the tech sector.

articles.title: This experimental camera can focus on everything at once - The Verge
articles.description: A new lens technology developed by researchers at Carnegie Mellon University brings every part of a scene into sharp focus, no matter the distance.
articles.content: The depth-defying lens can focus on multiple objects at different distances. The depth-defying lens can focus on multiple objects at different distances. by J… [+3239 chars]
